channel.title: Update server requests
channel.description:
please post if you know more
2 10 itemdef 2 9 npcdef 2 8 Sidebar interface text? 2 6 objectdef 3 # maps?

item.title: Update server requests
item.dc:creator: @Discount_Waffles Discount Waffles
item.description:
@Discount_Waffles wrote:

0 * - Animation Def1
1 * - Animation Def2
2 3 - Player Displays
2 6 - NPOs
2 9 - NPCs
2 10 - Items
2 12 - Animation Sequences
3 * - Interfaces
7 * - Models
8 * - Sprites
12 * - ClientScripts
13 * - ? (At least 6 of the files contain font data)

Read full topic

item.title: Update server requests
item.dc:creator: @_cake _cake
item.description:
@_cake wrote:

oH, then 2 8 is random interface shit; like ‘attack’, ‘hunter’, and quest names.\

3 * is random text data; like “Store 1”, “Store 2”, and “Store 5” in 15, or “Message of the week” in 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21, etc…
28 holds blast furnace things I believe; hence “Blast Furnace Bar Stock” . 24 holds “Kill Count: %1” and “Kill Count: Too Many!”.
OOH, and 3 89 has some nice side interface stuff, too. ´ ÿÿÿÿ ñ%1 ÿ˜ ( ´ £ ÿÿÿÿ F . ÿÿ +  ŽStab d F . ÿÿ +  ŽLunge : F . ÿÿ +  ŽSlash c : F . ÿÿ +  ŽBlock $ " ÿÿ ðÿÿÿÿ v " ÿÿ ïÿÿÿÿ $ ?
